summary: Part one of many to come. fully functional follower. Soon to come: Quests and In depth Backstories
descriptionHtml: This is my first Mod and I had the idea for it born in the place as most of my other ides-the shower. This is going to add more than 60 followers total. Their will be separate downloads for each follower and at the end, one large file combining every follower. The will be 1 follower for each race, sex and class along with a couple special followers. This will allow me to make a follower for most every chacter! I hope you enjoy it.
author: Koty2002
